special_text:
[+1]: You may play an additional land this turn.
[-1]: Discard a card. If you do, return target creature, land or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
[-5]: Create Thrice-Folded Lotus, a colorless Masterpiece artifact token with “{T}: Add three mana of any one color.” and “{3}, {T}: This artifact deals 3 damage to any target.”
